name: Naomi's Exhibition
description:
Rhythm, Romance, Eroge


During a local holiday, Naomi was called to update the security camera system. Taking advantage of the cameras have been turned off, she decides to put her fetish into action.

Now she wants to share photos of her adventure with you. But it won't be that easy, you need to beat her in a competitive rhythm game.



Summon slimes into battle in a 3-button rhythm-based game. Unleash new slimes and discover their strengths and weaknesses in 20 thrilling battles against Naomi.



  • Strategic Rhythm Game
  • 10+ Musics
  • Mobile Interface with Chat, Gallery and Game
  • 18+ Special Content
  • Steam Achievements
